tasks.task_description: Create DynamoDB tables for subscription management (subscriptions, billing-cycles, invoices)
Implement Cashfree subscription creation API endpoint (/pg/subscriptions)
Create subscription webhook handler for Cashfree notifications
Build customer billing portal frontend components
Implement subscription lifecycle management (create, modify, cancel, reactivate)
Create recurring payment scheduler with EventBridge
Implement payment retry logic for failed renewals
Build invoice generation and email delivery system
Create subscription status management and entitlement updates
Add GST tax calculation for Indian market compliance
Create comprehensive testing suite for subscription flows

description: Full Cashfree Subscription API Implementation - Complete subscription management system with Cashfree payment gateway integration
